{"step_by_step_thinking": "The fetal adrenal gland is responsible for producing several types of steroids. However, the maximum steroid produced by the fetal adrenal is DHEA-S (Dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate). This is because the fetal zone of the adrenal gland, which is the largest part of the gland during fetal development, primarily produces DHEA-S.", "answer_choice": "A"}
